Wrap an ANSI styled string to a certain width

Source: R/ansiex.R
ansi_strwrap.Rd

This function is similar to base::strwrap(), but works on ANSI styled strings, and leaves the styling intact.

Usage

ansi_strwrap(
  x,
  width = console_width(),
  indent = 0,
  exdent = 0,
  simplify = TRUE
)

Arguments

x

ANSI string.

width

Width to wrap to.

indent

Indentation of the first line of each paragraph.

exdent

Indentation of the subsequent lines of each paragraph.

simplify

Whether to return all wrapped strings in a single character vector, or wrap each element of x independently and return a list.

Value

If simplify is FALSE, then a list of character vectors, each an ANSI string. Otherwise a single ANSI string vector.

See also

Other ANSI string operations: ansi_align(), ansi_columns(), ansi_nchar(), ansi_strsplit(), ansi_strtrim(), ansi_substring(), ansi_substr(), ansi_toupper(), ansi_trimws()

Examples

text <- cli:::lorem_ipsum()
# Highlight some words, that start with 's'
rexp <- gregexpr("\\b([sS][a-zA-Z]+)\\b", text)
regmatches(text, rexp) <- lapply(regmatches(text, rexp), col_red)
cat(text)
#> Nulla sint proident duis irure veniam proident fugiat consectetur ea. In occaecat culpa Lorem quis. Culpa tempor sint in officia Lorem anim qui ad occaecat in et. Qui incididunt consequat consectetur reprehenderit adipisicing. Laborum consequat et amet adipisicing. Magna laboris cupidatat aute nulla nisi occaecat fugiat Lorem adipisicing est magna ex fugiat. Ullamco magna duis dolore velit reprehenderit anim excepteur eu voluptate ad officia eiusmod cillum consectetur. Esse sunt nulla non ex minim voluptate esse. Mollit id cupidatat ex aliquip laboris reprehenderit ad irure amet non ipsum ad veniam. Minim minim aliqua dolore eu ullamco laborum sit Lorem reprehenderit adipisicing ullamco ipsum.

wrp <- ansi_strwrap(text, width = 40)
cat(wrp, sep = "\n")
#> Nulla sint proident duis irure veniam
#> proident fugiat consectetur ea. In
#> occaecat culpa Lorem quis. Culpa tempor
#> sint in officia Lorem anim qui ad
#> occaecat in et. Qui incididunt
#> consequat consectetur reprehenderit
#> adipisicing. Laborum consequat et amet
#> adipisicing. Magna laboris cupidatat
#> aute nulla nisi occaecat fugiat Lorem
#> adipisicing est magna ex fugiat.
#> Ullamco magna duis dolore velit
#> reprehenderit anim excepteur eu
#> voluptate ad officia eiusmod cillum
#> consectetur. Esse sunt nulla non ex
#> minim voluptate esse. Mollit id
#> cupidatat ex aliquip laboris
#> reprehenderit ad irure amet non ipsum
#> ad veniam. Minim minim aliqua dolore eu
#> ullamco laborum sit Lorem reprehenderit
#> adipisicing ullamco ipsum.
